Name: Aristocrat
Flavor: You are a patrician, and believe yourself to be one of a finer class of people.

Name: Heretic
Flavor: Your family belonged to a forbidden religion, which exposed you to the constant threat of persecution.
Feature Description: You have proficiency with the following focuses: orbs, staffs and wands.

Name: Mountainfolk
Flavor: You come from an isolated town in the mountains.
Feature Description: You have the relentless endurance power.

Name: Seafarer
Flavor: You grew up on boats or ships.

Name: Traveler
Flavor: Your family moved about a lot, whether out of wanderlust or necessity.

Name: Urchin
Flavor: You grew up on the streets, without parents â€“ or without parents worth speaking of.
Feature Description: You have proficiency with martial weapons in the light blade weapon group.
